name.firstSourceText: 姓名 张亚英 职称 教授 学科 计算机科学与技术学科 专业 计算机科学与技术 研究方向 大数据挖掘，时空大数据分析，智能交通信息系统，分布式系统 联系方式 通讯地址：上海市曹安路4800号同济大学智信馆217室 邮政编码：210804 联系电话：69589864 电子邮件：yaying.zhang@tongji.edu.cn 简介 张亚英，教授，2004年毕业于上海交通大学计算机科学与技术系，获工学博士学位，毕业后进入同济大学计算机系任教，主要的研究方向包括大数据与人工智能、智能交通系统以及分布计算。 主讲本科课程“数据结构”、“算法设计与分析”和硕士课程“分布式系统”。 长期从事时空大数据挖掘和分布式计算等方面的基础研究工作。先后承担和参与了包括国家自然科学基金、国家重点研发计划、科技部国际重点合作项目、国家基金委重大集成计划、上海市基础重大计划等各类科研项目20余项。对多源数据的融合与清洗、时空大数据的 挖掘与分析、数据驱动的漂移检测、分布计算环境中的大数据存储与计算任务调度、数据流中的不确定性建模与评估等领域进行研究，并在智能交通信息系统等多个领域进行应用验证。 近年来主要的学术论文： (1) Zheng Qi; Zhang Yaying; "DSTAGCN:Dynamic Spatial-Temporal Adjacent Graph Convolutional Network for Traffic Forecasting", IEEE Transactions on Big Data, 2022, DOI:10.1109/TBDATA.2022.3156366； (2) Zhang Yaying; Sui Xinyuan ; "RCIVMM: A Route Choice-based Interactive Voting Map Matching Approach for Complex Urban Road Networks", IEEE Transactions on Big Data, 2021，DOI :10.1109/TBDATA.2021.3057095； (3) Yixi Wu and Yaying Zhang, "Dynamic Time-Constrained Path Recommendation with User’s Preference," 2021 IEEE International Conference on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics (SMC), Melbourne, Australia, 2021, pp. 1641-1648. (4) Yang Liankun; Zhang Yaying; Zuo Jiankai ; "An Attention-Based Spatial-Temporal Traffic Flow Prediction Method with Pattern Similarity Analysis", 2021 IEEE Intelligent Transportation System s Conference (ITSC), Indianapolis, USA, 2021. (5) Xinyuan Sui and Y. Zhang, "Entropy-based Traffic Congestion Propagation Pattern Mining with GPS Data," 2021 IEEE 6th International Conference on Big Data Analytics (ICBDA), Xiamen, China, 2021, pp. 128-132. (6) Chuanfei Gong; Yaying Zhang ; "Urban Traffic Data Imputation With Detrending and Tensor Decomposition", IEEE Access, 2020, 2020(8): 11124-11137 (7) Xiayu Qiu and Yaying Zhang, "A Traffic Speed Imputation Method Based on Self-adaption and Clustering," 2019 IEEE 4th International Conference on Big Data Analytics (ICBDA), Suzhou, China, 2019, pp. 26-31. (8) Yaying Zhang; Guan Huang ; "traffic flow prediction model based on deep belief network and genetic algorithm", IET Intelligent Transport Systems, 2018, 12(6): 533-541. (9) Yaying Zhang and Yulong He, "An advanced interactive-voting based map matching algorithm for low-sampling-rate GPS data," 2018 IEEE 15th International Conference on Networking, Sensing and Control (ICNSC), Zhuhai, China, 2018, pp. 1-7. (10) Zheng Zhao and Yaying Zhang, "A Traffic Flow Prediction Approach: LSTM with Detrending," 2018 IEEE International Conference on Progress in Informatics and Computing (PIC), Suzhou, China, 2018, pp. 101-105. (11) Yaying Zhang, Wei Qiang, Zhengyu Yang: "A New Traffic Signal Control Method Based on Hybrid Colored Petri Net in Isolated Intersections". International Journal of Intelligent Transportation Systems Research. 15(2): 98-107 (2017) (12) Tianyuan Zhuang, Pengwei Wang, Yaying Zhang and Zhaohui Zhang, "A Novel Method for Open Relation Extraction from Public Announcements of Chinese Listed Companies," 2017 Fifth International Conference on Advanced Cloud and Big Data (CBD), Shanghai, China, 2017, pp. 200-205. (13) Yaying Zhang, Wangyan Lu, Yuanhui Sun, "Distributed Optimal Path Generation Based on Delayed Routing in Smart Camera Networks". KSII Transactions on Internet Information System. 10(7): 3100-3116 (2016). (14) Yaying Zhang, Yuefeng Fu and Wei Qiang, "Modeling and control of urban expressways with emergency using hybrid petri nets," 2016 IEEE International Conference on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics (SMC), Budapest, Hungary, 2016, pp. 001483-001489. 备注 博导/硕导
